name: places/ChIJz_OYt1FYwokROCYGMnt-uM8
adrFormatAddress: 701 10th Ave, New York, NY 10036-2900, USA

editorialSummary.text: Old-school hardware store with a wide variety of home improvement, restaurant & theatrical supplies.

originalText.text: Sadly this establishment is or has already closed. They were a wonderful team. The UPSIDE is that there is a petition to change the name of the street from Marcus Garvey Blvd; to the name of its female owner. Since opening the store in the 1920's, she has been a force for educating women and giving out micro loans to further their growth. An idea that has only recently been promoted on a worldwide basis. She is DEFINITELY a PIONEER. If anyone asks PLEASE SIGN THE PETITION

text.text: Sadly this establishment is or has already closed. They were a wonderful team. The UPSIDE is that there is a petition to change the name of the street from Marcus Garvey Blvd; to the name of its female owner. Since opening the store in the 1920's, she has been a force for educating women and giving out micro loans to further their growth. An idea that has only recently been promoted on a worldwide basis. She is DEFINITELY a PIONEER. If anyone asks PLEASE SIGN THE PETITION

originalText.text: Best hardware store in the neighborhood. I actually live closer to 3 different hardware stores but I go to this one because the quality is so good. Love how you gotta do a consultation because they store everything in the back. I’m not very handy so it’s been very reassuring to get recommendations from the experts. Also, I like that they don’t try to upsell you. One time I went in looking for new nails but the owner told me I could just use the nails I already had. I never thought I’d be this excited about a hardware store.

originalText.text:
I just wanted to take the time to thank the employee who helped me at this hardware store yesterday with my broken walker!! What a mess, the pin holding the wheel popped out, and the employee, kind man with grey hair, helped me with a quick, under $2 fix!

With his help, I got to the theater and was one of the last people to gain admittance to The Daily Show! But, I got in and I ended up seated right up front. ❤️ Anyway, thx again, Garden Hardware & Supply for being there!

originalText.text: The owner is very knowledgeable, and helpfully answered all my questions. With his recommendations, I was able to bring my broken ottoman  back to a sturdy condition.
